Reference

Habitat Functions

Functions that create habitat estimates given flow and some additional helper functions.

set_spawning_habitat()

Set Spawning Habitat Area

set_instream_habitat()

Set Instream Habitat Area

set_floodplain_habitat()

Set Floodplain Habitat Area

set_bypass_habitat()

Set Bypass Habitat Area

wua_to_area()

WUA to Area in Square Meters

weeks_flooded()

Duration of Floodplain Inundation

apply_suitability()

Apply Suitability Factor

square_meters_to_acres()

Square Meters to Acres

acres_to_square_meters()

Acres to Square Meters

Habitat Datasets

Flow to area rearing and spawning modeled relationships

habitat_data

Habitat Data

sacramento_habitat

Mainstem Sacramento River Habitat Data

yolo_bypass_habitat sutter_bypass_habitat

Bypass Flow to Habitat Area Relationships

delta_habitat

Delta Habitat Area

Miscellaneous Datasets

Datasets used as reference tables

modeling_exist

Habitat Modeling Status

watershed_lengths

Habitat Extent Lengths

weeks_inundated

Flow Thresholds for Number of Weeks Inundated

IChab.adult

Steelhead Adult Rearing Habitat
